game.name: Train Simulator: Münster - Bremen Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Built in the early 1870s, the 172 km stretch of main line between Münster and Bremen formed part of the larger Wanne-Eickel-Hamburg Railway – which had the goal of linking the Ruhr and Hamburg regions together.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Built in the early 1870s, the 172 km stretch of main line between Münster and Bremen formed part of the larger Wanne-Eickel-Hamburg Railway – which had the goal of linking the Ruhr and Hamburg regions together.
